title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: args.args.len() == 2'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
This was while compiling code for the Solana blockchain (BPF code generation). error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. ### Code None ```Rust ``` BPF SDK: /home/ctapang/.local/share/solana/install/releases/1.6.9/solana-release/bin/sdk/bpf Running: rustup toolchain list -v Running: cargo +bpf build --target bpfel-unknown-unknown --release Compiling pyth v0.1.0 (/home/ctapang/ZeroInterestDeFi/anchor/oracles/pyth/programs/pyth) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: args.args.len() == 2', /home/ctapang/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/anchor-syn-0.5.0/src/parser/accounts.rs:138:13 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report:
